product.name: Set sail, winsome snail!
product.tagline: Go wherever your heart guides you.
product.description: The world is vast, and you have all the time in the world to explore.

features.title: Organic Yet Alarmingly Slippery
features.description: Grown, not manufactured. Feels like a wet idea covered in ambition.

features.title: Built Using 100% Recycled Fleeb Residue
features.description: Sustainably sourced from interdimensional leftovers. Tastes like regret. Don't eat it.

features.title: Compatible with Most Dimensions
features.description: Now works in Dimensions C-137 through Z-19… and probably some cursed ones we don't talk about.

features.title: Semi-Sentient Mood Sensor
features.description: Changes color based on your mood. Turns purple if you lie to it.

features.title: Self-Rubbing Technology™
features.description: No buttons, no interface — just rub it until it activates. Results vary.

features.title: Chrono-Absorbent Core
features.description: Accidentally absorbs small amounts of time. Do not leave near children or paradoxes.

testimonials.name: Rick Sanchez
testimonials.quote: Honestly? Even *I* don't know how it works. That's how you know it's good.

testimonials.name: Stealy
testimonials.quote: I took one, then it took something from me. Fair trade, I guess.

testimonials.name: Summer Smith
testimonials.quote: It's weird, it's gross, it's kind of... elegant?

testimonials.name: Blamph Worker #442
testimonials.quote: I rub the Fleeb until the Dinglebop is juiced. Standard procedure.

specs.Material: Mostly ethical Grodus, hypoallergenic Schlami membrane
specs.Maintenance: Rub regularly. Whisper compliments. Avoid eye contact.
specs.Weight: Feels heavier when you're being watched

faq.question: Can I wash it?
faq.answer: Yes, but it might scream. That's normal. Probably.

faq.question: Will it bond with my soul?
faq.answer: Only if you let it. Or if it decides to. It's complicated.

faq.question: Is there a user manual?
faq.answer: Yes. It's written in a forgotten dialect of Intergalactic Bureaucratese.

faq.question: Can I return it?
faq.answer: Return policy varies by cosmic cycle and lunar mood.

footer.legalDisclaimer: Plumbus is not responsible for unintended consequences, spontaneous combustion, or accidental enlightenment. Use responsibly.

seo.title: Buy Your Very Own Plumbus – The Universal Household Essential | Rick and Morty Universe
seo.description: Everyone has a Plumbus, but no one knows why. Discover the only all-purpose device approved across dimensions. Grown, not manufactured. 100% confusing. Get yours today!
seo.author: Plumbus Marketing Collective 51b

openGraph.og:title: Plumbus – The Interdimensional Device Everyone Needs
openGraph.og:description: It's slimy, it's warm, it's confusing – and now it can be yours. Grown with love (and Fleeb) on Plumbubo Prime 51b.

twitterCard.creator: @blamphWorker442
twitterCard.title: Get Your Plumbus Now – Everybody Has One!
twitterCard.description: Buy the universal home device approved by 97% of sentient species (and Rick).

structuredData.name: Plumbus
structuredData.description: A mysterious, all-purpose organic device seen across the Rick and Morty universe. Used for cleaning, cooking, broadcasting and unknown functions.
